name: Cascade Select
description: Cascade Select is a component to select a value from a nested structure of options.

properties.name: cascade
properties.label: Cascade
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine an array of select items to display as the available options.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the default text to display when no option is selected.

eventHandlers.name: onClickItem
eventHandlers.label: On Click Item
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is triggered when user select item
